name: Nyasha Land of Elves
description:
In the depths of the ancient forest, where even the most experienced pathfinder did not go, the land of the most beautiful and courageous Elves disappeared. Do not miss your chance to get acquainted with the beautiful elves.

The game is a classic puzzle. You have to go through all ten stages, as well as three levels of difficulty, in which pleasant surprises await you ;-)

- Puzzle Game

- Artworks

- Nice music

- Steam achievements

Keyboard H: Complete Level
